```{r}

T <- 1
N <- 5
dat <- N:1
mft <- (0:(length(dat)-1))
sum(dat * mft)/(T*N)


T <- 1
N <- 6
dat <- N:1
mft <- (0:(length(dat)-1))
sum(dat * mft)/(T*N)

T <- 1
N <- 7
dat <- N:1
mft <- (0:(length(dat)-1))
sum(dat * mft)/(T*N)

heterog_score_1bin <- function(N){
  T <- 1
  dat <- N:1
  mft <- (0:(length(dat)-1))
  sum(dat * mft)/(T*N)
}
heterog_scores <- sapply(1:100, heterog_score_1bin)
plot(heterog_scores, 1:100)
```
